name: Immigrate to Paraíba
description: Paraíba is a state in Brazil's Northeast, bordered by Rio Grande do Norte, Ceará, Pernambuco, and the Atlantic Ocean, known for its coastal tourism, semi-arid climate, sugarcane economy, and festivals like Festa Junina and Carnival.
keywords: Paraíba, Northeast Brazil, João Pessoa, Campina Grande, semi-arid, tourism, festivals
